headline: Leadership Changes at EDUCATECH with New CEO Thomas Moore
description: EDUCATECH has appointed Thomas Moore as the new CEO, a move expected to bring fresh strategies to the company's Education operations.

headline: GLOBALTRADE Announces Layoffs to Reduce Operational Costs
